lead_paragraph: Rugby's return to the Olympics after a gap of 92 years is a "game-changer" for the sport as it looks to break out of its traditional heartlands, World Rugby chiefs said on the eve of the tournament on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Rugby-Olympics a 'Game-Changer' for Growth of Game
headline.main: Rugby-Olympics a 'Game-Changer' for Growth of Game

snippet: Rugby's return to the Olympics after a gap of 92 years is a "game-changer" for the sport as it looks to break out of its traditional heartlands, World Rugby chiefs said on the eve of the tournament on Friday....
